Description: Small rectangular fragment of papyrus bearing parts of three lines of Coptic in black ink on one side, written against the fibres (verso). The text is written in large letters.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380691) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380691)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Black inkMount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: filmoplast t self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: fair, incomplete
Acquisition notes: Acquired by the donor in the 1960s.
